ingredients.ingredient: 3 heads napa cabbage, cored and cut into quarters lengthwise
1 bunch green onions, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste

cookingTips: Salt cabbage lightly and let sit for 30 minutes to begin softening
Pack ingredients firmly into jars to minimize air pockets
Ferment at room temperature for 2-3 days before refrigerating for optimal flavor development
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through traditional Korean fermentation. Emphasize proper salting, packing, and fermentation timing for authentic kimchi.
